text: Tallard is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D45, D46, D119, D219, D346, D942 and N85 roads pass through the commune. == Location == The commune borders the Alpes-de- Haute-Provence department. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes
title: Tallard
